snippet.title: Parallel - Official Trailer [ English ]
snippet.description:
Check out the official website: http://www.parallel-game.com
Add the Game to your Steam wish list: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1388350/Parallel
Launch in 2022

Parallel is a first-person RPG adventure game, you will explore a parallel world with a new civilization. Each player will go through different environments, from mysticism, paradise to claustrophobic and destruction scenes. Your choices can change the course of story.

Check it out the game Parallel on the Steam page to have more details about it. If you want to help the project, add it to your Steam Wishlist and help me build even more on the Parallel world.
